an4.237:1.1: “Cattarimani, bhikkhave, kammani maya sayam abhinna sacchikatva paveditani.
an4.237:1.6: atthi, bhikkhave, kammam akanhaasukkam akanhaasukkavipakam kammakkhayaya samvattati.
an4.237:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco sabyabajjham kayasankharam abhisankharoti …pe… idam vuccati, bhikkhave, kammam kanham kanhavipakam.
an4.237:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco abyabajjham kayasankharam abhisankharoti …pe… idam vuccati, bhikkhave, kammam sukkam sukkavipakam.
an4.237:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco sabyabajjhampi abyabajjhampi kayasankharam abhisankharoti …pe… idam vuccati, bhikkhave, kammam kanhasukkam kanhasukkavipakam.
an4.237:5.1: Katamanca, bhikkhave, kammam akanhaasukkam akanhaasukkavipakam kammakkhayaya samvattati?
an4.237:5.3: Idam vuccati, bhikkhave, kammam akanhaasukkam akanhaasukkavipakam kammakkhayaya samvattati.
an4.237:5.4: Imani kho, bhikkhave, cattari kammani maya sayam abhinna sacchikatva paveditani”ti.
